meanings.definition: Privatdocents: individuals who teach at a university without being a regular faculty member.
meanings.sent1: The privatdocents at the university offer specialized courses to students.
meanings.sent2: Many privatdocents bring unique perspectives to the academic environment.
meanings.sent3: The privatdocents decided to host a fun quiz night for the students.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, privatdocents are like guest stars in a TV show.
meanings.sent5: The privatdocents' passion for teaching shines through in their lectures.
